quote: Unnatural, unorthodox, amoral: those pretensions crumble when confronted by true happiness. You shouldn't give another the authority to draw a line defining the boundaries of acceptable joy.
quote_letters: UNNATURAL UNORTHODOX AMORAL THOSE PRETENSIONS CRUMBLE WHEN CONFRONTED BY TRUE HAPPINESS YOU SHOULDNT GIVE ANOTHER THE AUTHORITY TO DRAW A LINE DEFINING THE BOUNDARIES OF ACCEPTABLE JOY
